title: APT / TOMAS THE SPONSOR barks apt

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""Governmental issues take me all ov..."
dialogueTree.english: "Governmental issues take me all over Revachol as you can see."
dialogueTree.polish: „Jak widać, rządowe sprawy zmuszają mnie do podróży po całym Revacholu”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Як бачыце, дзяржаўныя справы прымушаюць мяне падарожнічаць па ўсім Рэвашолі".

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""None of z'is is weird.""
Sunday Friend: ""If *stabilité* is ensured, progres..."
dialogueTree.english: "If *stabilité* is ensured, progress will naturally follow."

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""In a *wider* sense z'is is actuall..."
dialogueTree.english: "In a *wider* sense z'is is actually my apartment. And yours."
dialogueTree.polish: „W *szerszym* sensie to jest tak właściwie moje mieszkanie. I pańskie”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "У *большым* сэнсе гэта фактычна мая кватэра. І ваша".

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""*Transparence* has always been our..."
dialogueTree.english: "*Transparence* has always been our highest priority."

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""All of z'is is perfectly normal. A..."
dialogueTree.english: "All of z'is is perfectly normal. A bit mundane if anything."
dialogueTree.polish: „To wszystko jest normalne. Odrobinę przyziemne, jeśli już”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Гэта ўсё нармальна. Калі ўжо, то крыху зямное".

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""I don't z'ink conclusions should b..."
dialogueTree.english: "I don't z'ink conclusions should be rushed at z'is point."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie sądzę, aby wyciąganie wniosków na tym etapie było właściwe”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Я не думаю, што рабіць высновы на гэтым этапе правільна".

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""A *politicien* is never off z'e cl..."
Sunday Friend: ""Moderacy in everything -- even in..."
dialogueTree.polish: „Umiarkowanie jest najważniejsze – nawet gdy chodzi o umiarkowanie”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Умеранасць з'яўляецца найважнейшай — нават калі гаворка ідзе пра ўмеранасць".

dialogueTree.title: Sunday Friend: ""Everyone needs to share z'e *respo..."
dialogueTree.polish: „*Responsabilité* to coś, czym powinniśmy dzielić się wszyscy”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "*Responsabilité* — гэта тое, чым мы ўсе павінны дзяліцца".
